sentences.english: Don't leave the engine to warm up in winter; you're burning petrol unnecessarily.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的時候，不要讓引擎空轉，這是在不必要地費油。

sentences.english: It was not easy to work in the shed;in winter it was a veritable ice-box.
sentences.chinese: 在這木棚裏工作可不輕鬆，冬天簡直是個冰箱。

sentences.english: There was adequate snow last winter.
We go there not only in winter, but also in summer.
sentences.chinese: 我們不只冬天去那邊，並且炎天也去。

sentences.english: The swallows go south in winter.
Images of winter trees have no leaves and white backgrounds because of the snow.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的樹圖沒有葉子，而且因爲雪呈現白色的背景。

sentences.english: China Philharmonic Orchestra is putting on a series of twelve concerts in winter.
sentences.chinese: 今年冬天中國愛樂樂團將舉辦十二場系列音樂會。

sentences.english: And in spite of its being winter I would perspire all over.
sentences.chinese: 儘管這時還是冬天，我卻渾身都被汗溼透。

sentences.english: I like winter best because we can make snowmen and go skiing.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡冬天，因爲我們能做雪人和去滑雪。

sentences.english: A fire could be lit under the vat in winter to stop the water from freezing.
sentences.chinese: 在大缸下面是可以點火的爲了防止水冬天結冰。

sentences.english: With the arrival of winter, the snow and ice would help to cover the pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 隨着冬天的來臨，冰雪會將管道遮蓋住。

sentences.english: Winter is a DiShuiChengBing, HaQi into frost season.
sentences.chinese: 冬天是一個滴水成冰，哈氣成霜的季節。

sentences.english: People catch all kinds of infections in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 人們在冬天易患各種各樣的傳染病。

sentences.english: This soup helps to enhance blood circulation. It is a winter delicacy that helps to keep our body warm.
sentences.chinese: 此湯行氣活血，特別適合冬天服用，可幫助驅寒保暖。

sentences.english: Three kinds of children is certain to consider suitable cures in winter.
sentences.chinese: 有三類孩子的確需要考慮在冬天適當進補。

sentences.english: I went there two times, one is in summer, and the other is in winter.
sentences.chinese: 我分別在夏天和冬天兩次走進蔚縣。

definition: cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
